plot: Rice's new novel continues the epic occult saga that began with The Witching Hour and Lasher. Taltos takes readers back through the centuries to a civilization part human and part of wholly mysterious origins, at odds with mortality and immortality, justice and guilt.
characters: Rowan Mayfair, Michael James Timothy Curry, Mona Mayfair, Ashlar, Samuel, Yuri Stefano, Mary Jane Mayfair, Dolly Jean Mayfair
